content: I'm tagging @Simone Heckmann who presented the FHIR intro session this morning. I approached her about adapting it to be suitable for the general public, and she said sure. Let the fun begin...

I uploaded my Presentation to Google Drive, so anyone can edit or comment:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sUw7J9w1CxGOM4oZspoP2v1CD52iYPHz/view?usp=sharing
Go wild! :D
